thread.title: Rob B
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Rob B

author: Rob B
title: Rob B
text: As a contractor I need vendors who will service my clients as I do. Emory treated my clients wonderfully and took care to help us find the perfect material for the project. The Tigressa carpet felt great and looked beautiful in the new addition. I am happy with my choice and my client is happy with me. Thank you Emory.
